item.description:
Hello MSSF Meetup Members,

At citizens' request, the Department of Conservation and Recreation (DCR) has undertaken the Forest Future Visioning Process (FFVP) to guide the stewardship of public lands throughout the Commonwealth. DCR is seeking public input on the designation criteria until Jan. 21. The Massachusetts Forest and Park Friends Network, a group I helped form, has been closely involved in the process. We've put together some points we think are of concern, which can be found http://hosted.vertica...]here[/url]. I hope you will take a few minutes to think about the future of MA forests and parks and send your comments to DCR at Designation.comments@state.ma.us. Thank you for caring about our forests and parks.
item.how_to_find_us: Not a meeting, but a request to help forest and parks by sending in comments on forest and park designations to DCR.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Please Speak Up For Forests and Parks
